aboutPage.mainContentParagraph1: NGE Ambalaj was established in 2012 and operates as an industrial packaging materials trading company in Adana Organized Industrial Zone in southern Turkey. We work in accordance with the dynamics of the sector, with principles of high quality and sustainable business partnership.
aboutPage.mainContentParagraph2: Since our establishment, our main mission is to provide packaging solutions, especially industrial stretch films (pre-stretched stretch) and PET straps, that optimize the logistics and shipping processes of businesses. Our products are selected with durability, strength and reliable performance criteria, and supplied in accordance with national and international standards.
aboutPage.mainContentParagraph3: Our team, specialized in strapping machines, straps, industrial oils and packaging materials, works to provide the most suitable solutions to the needs of our customers.
